## Overview

An introduction to R for Cawthron ECRs. We can cover a range of topics, starting with a simple introduction to R and RStudio, and going from there...

-   Session 1: an introduction to R, RStudio and the `tidyverse`
-   Session 2: for-loops, \*pply functions and parallelisation
-   Session 3: bibliometric tools



## Set up

Bring your laptop. Stuff to install before the first session:

-   [R](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/)
-   [RStudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)

Also, please install the [`tidyverse`](https://www.tidyverse.org) meta-package (collection of multiple packages), this can be done by running `install.packages("tidyverse")`.
